mapper.select: select cmt_no as cmtNo, post_no as postNo, cmt_content as cmtContent, cmt_writer as cmtWriter, cmt_date as cmtDate from cmt where post_no = #{cmtNo} order by cmt_date asc
mapper.insert: insert into cmt (cmt_no, post_no, cmt_content, cmt_writer, cmt_date) values(cmt_no_seq.nextval, #{postNo}, #{cmtContent}, #{cmtWriter}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update cmt set cmt_content = #{cmtContent}, cmt_date= sysdate where cmt_no = #{cmtNo}
